location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 85 to Ahmud Ben Khautoom, Sheikh of Congoon [Kangān], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter acknowledges receipt of a letter from the Sheikh and accepts that the seized letters were open by mistake (the Sheikh is encouraged to ensure this does not happen again). The letter explains that although property of Bussora [Basra], the boats are in service of the Company and again asks for their release. It is questioned whether Bushire will be able to persist using Congoon [Kangān] vessels for messenger services if the vessels are not released.
